project.x-prompt: What is the name of the project to set up a rspack for?

main.description: Path relative to the workspace root for the main entry file. Defaults to '<projectRoot>/src/main.ts'.

tsConfig.description: Path relative to the workspace root for the tsconfig file to build with. Defaults to '<projectRoot>/tsconfig.app.json'.

target.description: Target platform for the build, same as the rspack config option.

devServer.description: Add a serve target to run a local rspack dev-server

uiFramework.description: The UI framework used by the project.

skipValidation.description: Do not perform any validation on existing project.
